entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a guide who leads the first-year students down a steep path to Hogwarts. He has a big hairy face and calls out instructions to the students.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the first-year students who follows Hagrid down the path. He thinks there must be thick trees on either side of them due to the darkness.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another first-year student who keeps losing his toad and sniffs once or twice as they follow Hagrid down the path.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who follows him into a boat with Neville and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another first-year student who follows Hagrid down the path and gets into a boat with Ron, Neville, and Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is introduced as a vast castle with many turrets and towers perched atop a high mountain on the other side of a great black lake.

relationships.description: Hagrid leads the first-year students to Hogwarts, which is perched atop a high mountain on the other side of a great black lake.
